channel.title: Pauses and applydead NPC

item.title: Pauses and applydead NPC
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Help with a pause code. I want around a 5 second pause before it starts the animation, then ill put some 1 second in between some new anim’s. heres the code, what do I need to add?

I also want the NPC to die. and not respawn.

[code]if (useItemID == 273 &&

atObjectID == 4712)
{
teleportToX = 2806;
teleportToY = 2787;
deleteItem(273, GetItemSlot(273), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
entangle();
\(Pause here)
}

if(actionTimer == 0); {
animation(435, 2787,2807);
\(pauses, new anims etc.)
sendMessage(“The king falls from the poison.”);
\applyDeadNPC, don’t respawn pl0x

}[/code]

Read full topic
